attributes.action: Climate change. We need to act fast.
attributes.additional_details:
A few ideas and proposals:
-set up a climate committee worldwide with international communication. Britain isn’t the lead producer of greenhouse gases, we must communicate with countries who produce more.
-renewable energy. We need this for the future. Vastly increase spending on renewable sources like solar panels for schools and hospitals.
-provide jobs for thousands by creating a vast “clean up” programme in Britain’s beaches and oceans and a planting tree campaign.
attributes.background: We must protect our children’s futures. They will take care of the planet after us. We’re a powerful and respected country and we can make a difference in global politics with this pressing and relevant issue.
